Question: MemryX CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MemryX Inc.

MX3 AI Accelerator

- Production-ready silicon for AI processing
- Capable of efficiently running hundreds of unaltered AI models
- Live demonstrations include multi-stream AI-enabled video management system, AI Powered PC, Threat and Weapons Detection, Avatar-based video conferencing, PPE Detection, Aerial informatics and robotics simulation, Gen AI language model, and Smart city traffic management
- Designed for edge AI processing with a proprietary compute-at-memory technology and dataflow architecture
- Backed by leading investors including HarbourVest, Arm IoT Fund, eLab Ventures, M Ventures, and Motus Ventures
